<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Titan's Stature](/Feats.aspx?ID=166) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 92 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[giant instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=4); [Giant's Stature](/Feats.aspx?ID=149)

</column>

---

You grow to even greater size. When using [Giant’s Stature](/Feats.aspx?ID=149), you can instead become Huge (increasing your reach by 10 feet if you were Medium or smaller) while you are raging. You have the [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) condition as long as you are Huge.
